name: Hapi Ang Buhay
overview: Hapi ang Buhay is the sequel-spinoff of Walang Take Two, which was nominated at the 2016 International Filmmaker Festival of World Cinema for Best Comedy. The first season of Hapi ang Buhay premiered on March 6, 2016 on Net 25, with a weekly air time every Saturday at 4:00 to 5:00 p.m., with replays on Sundays at 9:00 to 10:00 p.m. (PST), on Net 25. The second season was started on December 10, 2016.
